guide.introduction:
For all those sports enthusiasts out there, this one is for you. If you have any sports balls in your home just lying around and you really want to keep them, this is for you as well. Take an old item and use it in a new way.

This project is extremely easy and simple for all. While children will need adult supervision, makers of almost any age can create this. With a small number of tools and virtually no money, you can have a new bowl for the house in no time.
guide.introduction_rendered:
For all those sports enthusiasts out there, this one is for you. If you have any sports balls in your home just lying around and you really want to keep them, this is for you as well. Take an old item and use it in a new way.

This project is extremely easy and simple for all. While children will need adult supervision, makers of almost any age can create this. With a small number of tools and virtually no money, you can have a new bowl for the house in no time.

Relevant parts
  • Hollow sports ball
  • Thin wire
Tools
  • Dremel tool
  • hand-held electric drill
  • small drill bit

lines.text: Take a basketball which is partly filled with air. (It needs to have some air in it to make the cutting easier.)
lines.text_raw: Take a basketball which is partly filled with air. (It needs to have some air in it to make the cutting easier.)

lines.text: Using a Dremel rotary tool and a carbide disk, cut the ball in half.
lines.text_raw: Using a Dremel rotary tool and a carbide disk, cut the ball in half.

lines.text: Take one half of the ball that you cut in step 1 and cut the top off in a circle to create a base for the bowl.
lines.text_raw: Take one half of the ball that you cut in step 1 and cut the top off in a circle to create a base for the bowl.

lines.text: Drill eight holes in the bowl. Space them  evenly around it where it will meet the base. Drill matching holes in the base.
lines.text_raw: Drill eight holes in the bowl. Space them  evenly around it where it will meet the base. Drill matching holes in the base.

lines.text: These holes will have wire strung through them to hold the two parts together.
lines.text_raw: These holes will have wire strung through them to hold the two parts together.

lines.text: Insert wire through the holes and twist the wire together to firmly attach the bowl to the base.
lines.text_raw: Insert wire through the holes and twist the wire together to firmly attach the bowl to the base.

lines.text: There you go, a bowl for your next party!
lines.text_raw: There you go, a bowl for your next party!

guide.summary: Make a themed snack bowl for your next sports gathering.
